en: The border facility is in complete lockdown, with armed security patrolling every corridor.
[pulse freq=3][color=RED]ATTENTION! LEVEL RED security situation![/color][/pulse] Classified documents were stolen last night.
We have a [tornado radius=4 freq=3][color=CRIMSON]traitor in our midst[/color][/tornado]. Anyone withholding information will be treated as complicit.
All officers, line up for [wave amp=15 freq=2][color=DARK_ORANGE]security scanning[/color][/wave]. Those with elevated stress responses will be flagged.
Have you seen what's happening outside? Pamphlets everywhere showing [color=DARK_VIOLET]Root Reserve[/color] is made from... [pulse freq=3][color=CRIMSON]from us[/color][/pulse].
"Keep your voice down. We're all being watched."
"I've heard the same rumors. It's horrifying if true."
"That's ridiculous propaganda. Don't spread such lies."
You're right. But if it's true... what does that make us?
My cousin was rejected last month. Does that mean...? I [color=CHARTREUSE]can't do this anymore[/color].
Their expression becomes guarded. Of course. Loyal Spud forever.
State your whereabouts last night between 2200 and 0400 hours.
"I was in my quarters the entire night, sleeping."
"I'd prefer to speak to my legal representative first."
Your stress levels indicate [color=YELLOW]deception[/color]. However... inconclusive. You may go for now.
Legal representative? This is a security procedure, not a trial. Your refusal has been noted.
A burly security guard approaches during your break. His face is haggard.
Hey... you're one of the customs officers, right? I've been asking around about my wife, Elena.
She crossed this checkpoint three weeks ago. [color=STEEL_BLUE]Failed inspection.[/color] I haven't heard from her since.
"Viktor... I found something. About Elena. You need to know the truth."
"I'm sorry, Viktor. I haven't seen anything." (Lie to protect him)
You show him a copy of the manifest page. His face goes white.
[wave amp=25 freq=3]His hands tremble as he reads.[/wave] [color=GOLD]Elena Petrov[/color]... [color=CRIMSON]Processed... Batch RR-2851...[/color]
His voice is barely a whisper. [tornado radius=3 freq=2][color=CRIMSON]They... they MADE her into...[/color][/tornado]
His grief transforms into cold fury. [pulse freq=2][color=CRIMSON]Idaho will pay for this.[/color][/pulse] I swear it on her memory.
He grips your shoulder. [color=CHARTREUSE]Thank you for telling me.[/color] When the time comes... I'll remember this.
He nods sadly. [color=STEEL_BLUE]I thought so.[/color] No one knows anything. Or no one wants to talk.
If you hear anything... [color=YELLOW]please.[/color] She's all I have.
It's working. The manifests have caused an uproar, but [color=DARK_ORANGE]Russet suspects us[/color].
Watch for allies from our organization during today's shift. [color=CHARTREUSE]You'll recognize them[/color].
If you can get them through safely, use the [color=CHARTREUSE]special mark we discussed[/color].
"It's worth the risk. I'm in."
"This is getting too dangerous. Maybe we should lay low."
I knew I could count on you. When this is over, [color=CHARTREUSE]Spud will know who the real heroes were[/color].
We're way past that point. Laying low won't save us. [color=CHARTREUSE]Only bringing down the system will[/color].
Each station now has the new [color=DARK_ORANGE]RealityScan system[/color]. It detects unauthorized markings and forgeries.
All documents must be scanned before approval. The [color=CRIMSON]traitors will be rooted out[/color]. I guarantee it.
Later that shift, a traveler approaches with papers bearing the [color=CHARTREUSE]subtle resistance mark[/color].
The [color=DARK_ORANGE]RealityScan[/color] begins its sweep. [wave amp=15 freq=3][color=RED]It's going to detect the mark![/color][/wave]
You have seconds to decide. The scanner is warming up...
"Fake a scanner malfunction - quickly!" (Help the resistance)
"Let the scanner complete its scan" (Follow protocol)
[pulse freq=3][color=YELLOW]You need to work fast![/color][/pulse] Trigger the malfunction before it finishes scanning!
You fumble with the scanner cables. Sparks fly. The screen flickers and dies.
Russet rushes over. [color=YELLOW]What happened here?[/color]
"Power surge, sir. These new systems are temperamental."
"I don't know, sir. It just died on me."
Russet grunts. [color=STEEL_BLUE]Bureaucrats giving us untested equipment.[/color] Process them manually and flag for re-inspection.
Russet eyes you suspiciously. [color=YELLOW]How convenient.[/color] I'll have maintenance look at it. Don't let this happen again.
The resistance member gives you the slightest nod of gratitude as they pass through.
The scanner [pulse freq=3][color=RED]BEEPS LOUDLY[/color][/pulse]. Unauthorized markings detected!
Russet appears instantly. [color=CHARTREUSE]Well done![/color] Another traitor caught.
The resistance member is dragged away, terror in their eyes. "[color=CRIMSON]Please, no! I have children![/color]"
Your loyalty is [color=DARK_ORANGE]noted in your file[/color]. Keep this up.
Helping resistance members just got much more dangerous, but [color=CHARTREUSE]the truth must spread[/color].
